title: march 1: a peaceful corporation (with Caroline Kingsbury)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about when John F. Kennedy founded the Peace Corps. Turning to music, she brings on special guest Caroline Kingsbury to talk about this day in her life. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
